property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd like to say that it's our pet, but the reverse may be closer to the truth." - Ixor, initiate of Rhet crop

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family - charge!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please don't feed the beetles." - Promenade warning sign

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature must be blocked this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The baloth's instincts boiled, its muscles pulled taut, and its razor-spines bristled, as it turned to face - a runt meepling.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the lion knows more stories than I do." - Chulane, Teller of Tales

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best engineers recognize when a problem has already been solved.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put that card on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All are prey to the eyes of the wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It wasn't long until the elves had developed a use for every part of the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many elves incorporate the beauty of nature into their inventions. Very few capture its savagery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Nessian Hornbeetle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first rule of politics can be learned from a lowly hornbeetle: it is wise to cultivate powerful friends." - Pythamon, sage of Meletis

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy - until they catch the scent of prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our enemy is nothing less than the end of all life. We shall not want for allies." - The War Diaries

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhonas's monument is home to a wider variety of creatures than anywhere else in the city of Naktamun - a feature most initiates fail to appreciate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here lies Gond, hero of Safehold Taldwen. May he ever guide our quest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For each creature that arrives in its audience, the sage imparts another piece of ancient wisdom for all to hear.

property.value: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.

property.value: "All we know about the Krosan Forest we have learned from those few who made it out alive." - Elvish refugee

property.value: "Aether is the soul of Kaladesh, and all souls should be free."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the dim light beneath the vast trees of Deepglade, baloths prowl in search of prey. Their guttural calls are more felt than heard, but their attack scream carries for miles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power. {G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Silhana Wayfinder enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."

property.value: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.

property.name: Flavor
